Cashier ID Enter your Cashier ID Password Enter Password Please enter Cashier ID Please enter Password Please enter customer name Please enter customer number Empty Cart Please enter valid number Proceed Register Skip Touch To Start Your Cart 439 Kcal / 28.9g Protein / 83.5g carbs / 83.5g Fat 1 Say \"Hello Breez\" \n to get started Where would you like to eat? Dine In Take Away Order Total $00.00 Rodeo Burger No Lettuce No Tomato All Categories Category Payment Failed Sorry for the inconvenience Your payment has failed due to some technical error. Please try again Retry Payment Please place your mobile screen in front\nof the scanner to sign in. We couldn\'t find your profile. You can\nregister or skip the sign in. We couldn\'t process your command. You can\nproceed manually touching the screen Frequently Bought Together Chocolate Shake Go To Menu Are you sure you want to clear all items? Are you sure you want to remove this item? Pay Now Explore our menu! Item Name Start Over Our Best-Selling Burger with Crispy Patty, Fresh\nOnion and our Signature Sauce. Coke, fries and cheese burger
Thank You! Kindly collect your receipt and take\nyour order from the counter Your order no. is Done Full Name Enter your name Contact number Scan QR code Enter your phone number Okay User not found ! Subtotal $2.43 Total Payment Method Cash Tax Try saying "view categories" or "add rodeo burger"… Please insert or tap\nyour credit card Sanjeev Varshney Loyalty Points: 2,000 Recent Orders Add Checkout Sauce Lettuce Bacon Tomato Cheese Patty
Hello blank fragment Fragment One Fragment Two Fragment Three Fragment Four Fragment Five
Something went wrong View Categories
Permissions Required! In order to begin this app. Please provide mic and storage permissions. Open Setting Cancel Item Total $10.49 SIGN IN 101 Size Small Spice Add To Cart Medium Large Mild Hot Select Language Make it a meal Select English
Store ID Device configuration POS ID Company ID Reset Select Your Items Call Assistant Wait for a moment, our staff is coming\nto assist you.
Sms Print OK Please enter your Phone number Invoice 9999999999 Please insert or tap your card
Choose from the option given below. Say \'SKIP\' Select Your Meal \'Say: Add Burger\' Build your burger \'Say Add Tomato\' Are you ready to checkout ? Say \'I want to pay\' Cancel Order
/// * Stripe Payment reader strings **///
AMOUNT
Check for update Checking for update Collect card payment Collect payment Collect a card payment using a physical Stripe test card and a card reader COMMON WORKFLOWS Connecting… CURRENCY CURRENT VERSION 100 $1.00 Disconnect Discovery Discover Readers DISCOVERY METHOD Empty Reader EVENT LOG Version %1$s available. The reader will become unresponsive until the update is complete. Estimated update time: %2$s. Install update The reader will temporarily become unresponsive. Do not leave this page, and keep the reader in range and powered on until the update is complete. NEARBY READERS No reader connected No update available Read card for recurring payment Reader READER CONNECTION %1$s %2$s Simulated The SDK comes with the ability to simulate behavior without using physical hardware. This makes it easy to quickly test your integration end-to-end, from connecting a reader to taking payments. Terminal Testing Update complete Check if a reader software update is available. Update in progress Update progress: %1$.1f%% Update Reader Update reader software USD Locations Select Location Last used location %s Locations Found %s+ Locations Found Bluetooth readers must be registered to a location during the connection process. If you do not select a location, the reader will attempt to register to the same location it was registered to during the previous connection. Unknown Reader Will register to last location: %s Will register to location: %s ❗️ No last location, please select one first Please select a location This reader does not have a previously registered location. Please select a location to register it to. Okay Create Create Location Display Name HQ Address Line 1 510 Townsend St Line 2 City San Francisco State CA Country US Postal Code 94103 Create Location This field is required. Skip Tipping TIPPING Must have on-reader tipping configured to have any effect.
Request extended auth Request incremental auth Loyalty Points: 2000 Say Your Number Continue as a guest Profile not found! No recent orders found! Your item is added, would you like to checkout or add more items Your item is already added, would you like to checkout or add more items Quantity has been increased Quantity has been decreased has been added has been removed Best Sellers Clear Cart No Yes Remove Item Confirm Submit Select Printer Printer Settings 1. Kiosk Printer 1. Kitchen Printer 1.1.1.1 Test Apply
Payment Settings Voice Ordering End Session Settings Voice has been enabled! Voice has been disabled! Need Help? Speak when the icon turns red. The last icon\nindicatees that your voice is processing This icon indicate that there is a technical\nerror or you\'ve reached the input limit Search for dishes & items This icon indicate that the\nmic is disabled. Search Didn\'t find what you\'re\nlooking for? listening… Scan QR for digital receipt Start New Order Discover Our Menu Welcome back Select your Category $0.00 Save Session In Delivery Options Send Device Report
Are you sure you want to end session? Network Issue We\'ll be back online shortly.\n Thank you for your patience! The Kiosk was idle for 30 seconds.\nDo you want to start over
An unexpected error occurred forcing\nthe application to stop. Please try again. Refresh App has Crashed. Powered by Cyntra.ai Restart Filters Stickers Frame Text Share Make a memory Help Mute speaking… Customize Your Pizza No Response Continue System Idle Payment Mode Credit Card QR Scan Scan QR code\nfor payment

Hello, Welcome to Breez, please say your order preference, Try saying ‘Dine In‘ or ‘Take Away‘ Please say your contact number to sign-in, or try saying, ‘Guest‘ to proceed as a guest Welcome back %1$s would you like to repeat your last order or proceed to menu?" Your items are already added, would you like to checkout or add more items from the menu? Your item is already added, would you like to checkout or add more items from the menu? Your items are added, would you like to checkout or add more items from the menu? Your item is added, would you like to checkout or add more items from the menu? Explore our menu and add the items of your choice, try saying, ‘Select Sides’, ‘Add Chicken Burger’ Select a category or choose from our bestsellers, try saying, ‘Select Burgers’, ‘Add Coke’ How would you like to customize your selected item? Try saying, ‘Add Cheese’ How would you like to customize your selected item? Try saying, ‘Increase quantity‘ ‘Size Medium’ ‘Spice Hot’ Would you like to checkout or add more items? Kindly enter your details Customize your pizza? Try saying, ‘select medium‘
You have %1$d item in your cart, review your order and say ‘I want to pay now‘ to pay.
You have %1$d items in your cart, review your order and say ‘I want to pay now‘ to pay.
Your total amount is $ %1$s insert or tap your card to complete the order Thank you. Your order number is %1$s.Please collect your order from the counter. Kindly enter your details
